|brand = D-Link |model = DHP-1320 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Powerline Access Point, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2HP1320A1 |icid = 4216A-HP1320A1 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR7241; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 400 |cpu2chip1 = Atheros;INT6400A1G; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU2 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = <!-- CPU2 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6445EM2I-10G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Zentel;A3S56D40FTP-G5; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 16 |ram2chip = ProMOS;V54C3128164VCI6; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8032; |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 5C:D9:98 |oui = 5C:D9:98
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.4 |pwr_conn = C7
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HomePlug AV |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = dlink |defaultssid_regex = ^dlink$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/11/2010 |estreldate = 01/18/2011 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 790069339219 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B004JXVLM0 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9287; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is using an: *[[Atheros]] ([[Intellon]]) INT6400A1G PLC MAC/PHY, *[[Atheros]] ([[Intellon]]) INT1400 PLC AFE/LD, *[[Atheros]] AR8032 FE (10/100) PHY, to link with *[[Atheros]] AR7241 SoC.
Default settings are per the FCC manual.
===Marked boards=== *"DHP-1320A1", "Rev:A1", and "2010/9/30" is silkscreened on the board of a production unit. *"21514D1320A11A1", "DIG-1320A1", "Rev.:A0-2", and "2010/7/14" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :'''Lelon''' capacitors are used on the router/PLC side of the board. :'''KXJ''' capacitors are used for the AC power section of the board.
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:DIG 1320 A1 Image L Front.jpg| File:DIG 1320 A1 Image L Side1.jpg| File:DIG 1320 A1 Image L Back.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
